divs: sighting detailsi was four years old. we lived outside lake carmel while my father attended ibm school. the house was directly across from a lake (my older sister knows how to get there, i don't remember). i was awakened by lots of light "bouncing" around my room. when i looked out the window i saw a giant column of light going in\coming out of the water of the lake. there were "tinkerbell" lights dancing all around the area. when i turned around there was a being (like the ones in cocoon) who communicated future things to me-i don't remember, or would understand, what i learned until my adulthood, and feel there is more locked inside. i felt the most love coming from the being; and ever after when i saw reflected light (like sunlight off a cup of coffee)i would become really excited because "lighty" was coming (he never did); but that's what my parents teased me about as my "imaginary friend". i have felt the same energy once since in a group meditation and believe the being's name to be hilarion, though what i have read that was supposedly channeled by hilarion doesn't "feel" right. i have always been different and have many other reasons why, but i believe what happened when i was four was very real.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Lake Carmel
There were no other sightings in Lake Carmel on or around November 30th 1955
